original_text: You are to lay your hand on the head of your offering and slaughter it at the entrance to the tent of meeting. Then Aaron’s sons the priests shall splash the blood against the sides of the altar.
korean_text: 그 예물의 머리에 안수하고 회막 문에서 잡을 것이요 아론의 자손 제사장들은 그 피를 제단 사방에 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: You are to lay your hand on the head of your offering
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 제물의 머리에 당신의 손을 얹어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: at the entrance to the tent of meeting
against the sides of the altar
